      TriangleDTO(CoordinatesDTO originPoint, Thickness thickness, int id)

      • TriangleDTO

        public TriangleDTO(boolean draw,
                   boolean fill,
                   ColorDTO drawColor,
                   ColorDTO fillColor,
                   Thickness thickness,
                   CoordinatesDTO originPoint,
                   CoordinatesDTO secondPoint,
                   CoordinatesDTO thirdPoint,
                   int id)
            throws FatalException
        Parameters:
        draw - Is the shape have a outer line, can be combined with fill.
        fill - Is the shape filled with a color, can be combined with draw.
        fillColor - Color to fill the shape with, color list in Color enum.
        drawColor - Outer line color, color list in Color enum.
        Throws:
        FatalException
